subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Federer is employing a new tactic in his return game — darting forward to the edge of the service line and taking the ball quickly with a half-volley — and his success has many observers buzzing.
snippet: Federer is employing a new tactic in his return game — darting forward to the edge of the service line and taking the ball quickly with a half-volley — and his success has many observers buzzing.
